Keys To Effective Teamwork

Effective teamwork hinges on a teams ability to recognize the strength of each individual, leveraging their unique skill set in order to maximize the teams effectiveness, efficiency, and enjoyment. Additionally, establishment of clear modes of communication is important in preventing misunderstandings and in ensuring group cohesiveness.
